title: Perpendicular Lines
text: Perpendicular lines have slopes that are negative reciprocals of each other. We check by multiplying the slopes and see if it equals $$-1$$.
speech: Perpendicular lines have slopes that are negative reciprocals of each other. We check by multiplying the slopes and see if it equals  minus 1 .

title: Perpendicular Lines
text: The slopes are negative reciprocals of each other, so the lines are perpendicular.
